name: Pac-Man Championship Edition Luminant/Shaded Windows Ver.
name_original: Pac-Man Championship Edition Luminant/Shaded Windows Ver.
description:
Play a familiar game with a neat twist to it. Play through 9 different mazes, and try to reach the highest score.

Too easy? Not to worry! Turn on some mods like Hidden or Hard to increase the difficulty and resulting score.

Too spicy? Turn some other mods like No-Fail to keep your cool.

Wanna play with some friends? Bring some extra controllers and beat mazes together!

To make things even more interesting, you can optionally play with custom characters with their own abilities and stats!
